Test Name: Inflammatory Myofibroblastic Tumor (IMT) 2p23 (ALK) Rearrangement by FISH
Purpose: To detect ALK gene (2p23) rearrangements in IMT for diagnostic confirmation and therapeutic guidance.
Container: Unstained 4–5 µm sections mounted on positively charged glass slides (from FFPE tissue block)
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope equipped with appropriate filters for DAPI and ALK probe fluorophores
